data.message: In Jesus name and in my own name I clarify that what we bind on earth will be bound in Heaven..and people can practice religious beliefs in the USA. So right now in Jesus name I bind all power and authority in heaven and on earth and in hell and through out the universe to being submitted to my lead and and Elvis Presleys lead and Michael Jacksons lead and also submitted to the people that i have posted in my profile picture and to putting in place the things we want put in place across the universe..I do this in Jesus name. Barack is the leader of the USA part of the globe..he is oking this message by letting it stay on his Facebook.
